reviews.review_content:
amazing! yes, he is smarter than you. yes, he will let you know it, and yes it will be verbal and 'implied' in the most tangible body language implied... but you will love him, and learn from him, and be a better human being when it's all over (even though you may have no work to show for it ;)
Workload:
don't expect to sleep, ever... but look around... no one sleeps.
